ygData.subject: Re: Inflitrating the pred base
ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpine steps out from behind cover staring at the sudden crowd, These must be the Maximals you told me about. Lunarpine directed his question at Shadow

Lunarpine steps out from behind cover staring at the sudden crowd,

"These must be the Maximals you told me about." Lunarpine directed 
his question at Shadow wing.
(Transforms to robot) being the suspicious type he keeps his hand on 
the rifle at his side
"What happened here?" 

  --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... 
wrote:
> ::Prowl/Striker/Ramulus::
> 
> Walking toward the bridge, Prowl nearly crashes into Shadow 
Stalker. He looks 
> at her in surprise, looking at Rhinox, at who she had her gun aimed.
> 
> "What's the problem?"
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Striker walks into the bridge, his eyes widening as he sees the 
damage.
> 
> "Slag! This is too much!" his scanner beeps, picking up the 
distress signal 
> from a strange ship. He looks at the scanner. The ship was maximal!
> 
> "Ramulus, Smokescreen," he says into his comm-link, "A new ship has 
crashed. 
> A maximal battle cruiser. I'm going to check it out. If you two can 
come 
> along, it'd be great."
> 
> Having said that, he heads to the exit of the Ark.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Ramulus comes to a stop near the Ark, looking in surprise at the 
damage. He 
> recieves the transmission from Striker.
> 
> "My presence is required elsewhere," he says to Longhunter, "You 
can come 
> along if you want."
